messages.msgSnippet: March 28 Toronto Star : No penalty for keeping girl out of school http://www.thestar.com/cgi-bin/gx.cgi/AppLogic+FTContentServer?pagename=thesta
messages.messageBody:
March 28
Toronto Star : No penalty for keeping girl out of school
http://www.thestar.com/cgi-bin/gx.cgi/AppLogic+FTContentServer?pagename=thesta

Canadian truancy case

Education Week : Paige Warns Districts of Increased Competition
http://www.edweek.org:80/ew/ewstory.cfm?slug=28paige.h20
Minor mention, but included here because of its glimpse in to the attitude
and position of our new education secretary.

March 27
Ames Tribune : Students to participate in geography bee
http://www.zwire.com/site/news.cfm?BRD=2035&dept_id=238095&newsid=1589255&PAG=

461&rfi=9
Homeschool student among the five to compete for state title.

March 26
The Advocate : LHS takes sounds of music to 'epitome' of famous stages
http://www.theadvocate.com/news/story.asp?StoryID=20255
Student to play Carnegie Hall after quitting homeschooling to attend school.
